articles.author: Lynn Brown
articles.title: The island city where Juneteenth was born - BBC
articles.description: One hundred and sixty years after word reached Galveston, Texas, that enslaved African Americans were now free, the city is honouring Juneteenth year round.
articles.content:
Galveston, Texas celebrates itself as the birthplace of Juneteenth (Credit: Getty Images)
